video.title: Deadman Wonderland
video.synopsis: Falsely convicted for the mass murder of his classmates, a schoolboy must endure a nightmarish penal system, all while trying to prove his innocence.

episodes.synopsis: After a mysterious figure slaughters his classmates, middle school student Ganta Igarashi is blamed and sent to the ominous Deadman Wonderland prison.
episodes.title: Death Row Inmate

episodes.synopsis: Ganta and his new friend Shiro must compete in a deadly prison contest to win an antidote to a poison that could kill them.
episodes.title: Antidote

episodes.synopsis: After Yo gives Ganta a piece of candy so he can stay alive, Ganta gets his chance to attack the Red Man, now known as the Wretched Egg.
episodes.title: G Block

episodes.synopsis: When Ganta attacks an inmate he wrongly believes to be the Wretched Egg, he loses the fight but discovers his Branch of Sin powers.
episodes.title: Crow Claw

episodes.synopsis: Ganta is forced into his carnival corpse match with Senji, but finds himself at a huge disadvantage when his projectiles send him into anemia.
episodes.title: Carrion Festival

episodes.synopsis: Ganta offers to help a girl escape from prison only to find that she is his next carnival corpse match, and has weakened him with their encounter.
episodes.title: Hummingbird

episodes.synopsis: After a strange quake hits, Ganta begins to recall his childhood with Shiro, who is revealed to be the Wretched Egg.
episodes.title: Original Sin (Wretched Egg)

episodes.synopsis: After Shiro saves him from Genkako, Ganta meets the other members of Scar Chain, who are planning to expose Deadman Wonderland's secrets.
episodes.title: Chains Of Freedom

episodes.synopsis: Genka and a few others fight to save the chip containing the information that the Scar Chain hopes to leak to the outside world.
episodes.title: Pro-oxidant (Worm Eater)

episodes.synopsis: Ganta gets mad at Shiro for throwing away the data chip, but soon learns that things aren't always what they seem.
episodes.title: Caretaker (Undertaker)

episodes.synopsis: Ganta asks Senji for lessons on how to fight using his Branch of Sin, but his progress is interrupted by Genkaku.
episodes.title: Gig Of Despair

episodes.synopsis: Ganta takes on a crazed Nagi in order to protect Shiro, but other bloody fighting breaks out.
episodes.title: Relief (Grateful Dead)

episodes.synopsis: Senji, a cop who wields a Branch of Sin, is lured into battle against the leader of the Goreless Peace gang when he helps a wayward orphan.
episodes.title: Wielder of the Red Knife
